detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low-cut neckline front and back. Short puff sleeves with wide elastication over the shoulders and narrow elastication at the hems. Seam under the bust and a smocked skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Bracelets in various designs. Two elastic bracelets with wooden beads, two elastic bracelets with wooden and metal beads and one elastic bracelet with metal beads. One multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with adjustable width.
Sleeveless top in a gently draping viscose weave with short, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a deep V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Basketball-inspired short-sleeved top in fast-drying, breathable mesh with a print motif and text appliqué on the front. Contrasting colour side panels and slits in the sides.
Flat, round earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter 0.4 cm, 0.8 cm and 1.3 cm.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.
Lightly padded sleeping sack in soft jersey with a quilted pattern. Press-stud on one shoulder and a concealed zip in one side that opens from the bottom. Jersey lining. For indoor use only.

Push-up bra in mesh and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from approx. 0.8 cm to 1.5 cm.
Playsuit in viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in a textured weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
Short-sleeved shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and horizontal strap with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring and ties at the cuffs, and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a seam and frill at the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Suit trousers in soft, brushed checked fabric with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and shorter, tapered legs with creases.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Short shorts in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with a sheen. Elasticated waist and short slits in the sides.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake pockets at the back and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.

Cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Patterned cardigan with press-studs down the front and long sleeves. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Pencil case in glittery transparent plastic with a print motif. Zip at the top. Height 5 cm. Width 6 cm. Length 20 cm.
Off-the-shoulder dress in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in satin with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the top and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Long puff sleeves, cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and pockets in the side seams. Zip fly and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Side support and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Flannel shirt in a woven cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Top in soft terry with a print motif on the front and buttons at the back. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Captain’s cap in a herringbone cotton weave with a peak, twisted cord at the front and buttons at the sides. Lined.
Boxy top in jersey crêpe with a round neckline, short sleeves and lace-patterned, laser-cut scalloped trims at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, textured knit with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, flounced dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, short raglan sleeves and a gathered seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Relaxed-fit dungarees in cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a three-part chest pocket and front and back pockets. Press-studs at the sides and tapered legs.
Wide, cold shoulder top in slub jersey with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in airy, patterned cotton jersey with wide cuffs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Waist-high briefs in lace and mesh with a lined gusset and string back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front. Long, raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Loose fit.
Short V-neck dress in jersey crêpe with a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with cuffs and decorative buttons. Unlined.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft, textured knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Gently flared vest top in marled jersey made from a cotton blend with deep armholes, a racer back and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), short, flounced sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Long-sleeved romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, and a gathered seam at the waist. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short blouse in airy chiffon with a square neckline at the front, covered buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Partly lined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with worn details in a relaxed fit with visible elastic at the back of the waist, a zip fly and button and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a round neckline that has an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and wide, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Short, straight-cut coat in a patterned, textured weave with lapels, 3/4-length sleeves and no buttons. Seam at the waist and on the sleeves, and slits in the sides . Unlined.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a large, patterned metal buckle. Width approx. 2.5 cm.
Lined, backless swimsuit with a frill trim, shaped cups with removable inserts and ties at the back of the neck.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Short wrapover blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, short flounced sleeves and ties at one side. Unlined.

Short, cold shoulder wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, short flounced sleeves and ties at the side. Flounce at the top that continues around the back, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck satin blouse with gathers at the shoulders, short flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend.
Fabric-covered Alice band decorated with a metal chain.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Short dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a square neckline and long sleeves. Unlined.
Wide, cropped jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front.
Blouse in an airy weave with inset lace trims at the front and a V-neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with smocking, a frill trim and ties at the cuffs, and ties at the hem.
Slip-on fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft slippers with embroidery and appliqués. High shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
